Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Ensures public safety announcements are accessible to visually impaired individuals
Summary: Requires that the state system for warning populations who are or may be endangered includes audible alerts for all announcements to ensure that information is accessible to visually impaired individuals.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to ensuring public safety announcements are accessible to visually impaired individuals
